description: Forms and guidance about applying for and managing ERDF-supported projects, and details of state aid schemes running in England.

details.body:
ERDF forms and guidance

The following forms and guidance must be used to manage the delivery of ERDF-supported projects. Many of the guidance documents offer advice about using ERDF forms.

  • English Business Support State Aid Scheme (PDF, 82.2 KB, 21 pages)
  • Full application form guidance (MS Word Document, 732 KB)
  • MCIS assets screen (PDF, 252 KB, 7 pages)
  • National eligiblity rules (PDF, 108 KB, 18 pages)
  • Procurement law compliance guidance note (PDF, 805 KB, 55 pages)
  • Procurement checklist (MS Word Document, 72.4 KB)
  • MCIS procurement screen (PDF, 118 KB, 7 pages)
  • National publicity requirements (PDF, 3.64 MB, 18 pages)
  • ERDF logos (4.43 MB)
  • National ERDF handbook (PDF, 598 KB, 137 pages)

Guidance to explain how to use the ERDF logos and contact details are in the document ‘National publicity requirements’ available above. Past versions of the guidance provided above is available on request from your local growth delivery team.

State aid law

State aid is an area of competition law which applies to public funding within the European Union.

The Department for Business, Innovation and Skills (BIS) state aid branch has lead responsibility within UK government for co-ordination and development of state aid policy.

  • National state aid law requirements (PDF, 186 KB, 35 pages)
  • State aid guidance (PDF, 1.26 MB, 22 pages)
  • State aid law: Application of the Leipzig Halle principle in ERDF infrastructure projects (PDF, 259 KB, 2 pages)

The following schemes have been notified by DCLG to take advantage of the state aid exemptions available under the State aid law: Application of the Leipzig Halle principle in ERDF infrastructure projects (PDF, 259 KB, 2 pages).

The schemes are only available for use by the named organisations. Aid may only be provided where the implementing body has satisfied all the terms of the scheme, including the reporting requirements.

  • English Environmental State Aid Scheme (PDF, 112 KB, 20 pages)
  • English Property Development State Aid Scheme (PDF, 58.9 KB, 8 pages)
  • English Research, Development and Innovation State Aid Scheme (PDF, 109 KB, 20 pages)
  • English Risk Capital Investment State Aid Scheme (PDF, 70.7 KB, 7 pages)
  • General Block Exemption Regulation 2008 (PDF, 223 KB, 45 pages)

change_history.note: English Property Development State Aid Scheme guidance updated to version 1.6.
North East ERDF Programme Business Support Guide updated for version 2.

West Midlands ERDF Business Support Guide version 3 now available.
East Midlands ERDF Business Support Guide version 1 now available.
Updated 2 documents: 'Full application indicators, costs and funding annex' and 'ERDF Article 55: revenue-generating projects requirements'.
Updated broadband definitions in Yorkshire and Humber local indicator guidance.
North East Business Support Guide added
Added 2 documents: 'MCIS procurement screen' and 'MCIS assets screen' in 'guidance' section.
Added v2 of full application checklist and local programme guidance documents. Page also updated to make it more relevant to current status of programme lifetime.
Added document 'State Aid and infrastructure: Leipzig Halle guidance'.
Various minor changes to the 'National publicity requirements' PDF.
